parameters.name: classname
parameters.description: If the classname is - OCA\GroupFolders\Settings\Admin : It's reference to fields in Admin Privileges. - OCA\GroupFolders\Controller\DelegationController : It's just to specific the subadmins. They can only manage groupfolders in which they are added in the Advanced Permissions (groups only)
